full_text: In 1989 when I was 11 years old, @WillClark22 signed a baseball card for me. Will the Thrill always has been, and always will be, my all-time favorite player. I'm delighted to be going to #oraclepark on July 30, 2022 when the @SFGiants are retiring No. 22! #WillClark #SFGiants https://t.co/ZjgUeoSVOR
McConnell is a horrible human being. https://t.co/ymMvLgKOyp
Man, the Braves look like asses. I hope they treat Kenley Jansen right! #braves #dodgers #mlb https://t.co/eORbDF8kq0
I've been relentlessly doomscrolling Ukraine war news. This is a huge power shift in Europe. My prediction: Putin will be gone before the end of the year. #UkraineRussianWar
